free_text.Form of examination: Continuous assessment, 2 tests per semester[br/]Each control counts for 25% of the final grading
free_text.Bibliography and material: Polycopié[br/]C. Delannoy, Programmer en Langage C, Eyrolles
free_text.Content: [br/][li]	Character strings[br/][li]	Text files[br/][li]	Binary files[br/][li]	Dynamic memory allocation[br/][li]	Structures[br/][li]	Preprocessor[br/][li]	Recursion[br/][li]	Linked lists[br/][br/]Training by means of the programming of simple algorithms in the frame of exercices on computer
